author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HUMBERTO LIKELY TO MERGE WITH A FRONTAL BOUNDARY ON WEDNESDAY... ...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS TO CONTINUE ACROSS THE WESTERN ATLANTIC COASTLINE THROUGH THE WEEK...
summary: ...HUMBERTO LIKELY TO MERGE WITH A FRONTAL BOUNDARY ON WEDNESDAY... ...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS TO CONTINUE ACROSS THE WESTERN ATLANTIC COASTLINE THROUGH THE WEEK... As of 11:00 PM AST Tue Sep 30 the center of Humberto was located near 34.8, -68.5 with movement ENE at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 979 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Humberto (AT3/AL082025)
